name: Lost in Zyberspace
description:
Take your mind off of the stressors of the real world and jump into Zyberspace! 

Play as Zander, a man capable of defeating all of the virusoids in this digital world. Can you conquer this worlds 5 exciting levels and, in turn, conquer your own fears?

Will you ever be able to escape Zyberspace?

This is a submission for Trans Representation Jam 22  and was developed entirely within the jam's timeframe. 

CONTROLS:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim camera
  • Esc to pause/quit
WARNING: This game contains depictions of depression, misgendering, and transphobia. Please stay safe!
